content: NoiseCraft is an open source, visual programming language and platform
for sound synthesis and music making, with the goal of creating a community for the open exchange of musical ideas.
The design is loosely inspired by PureData, Max/MSP as well as other visual programming languages.
NoiseCraft is built on technologies such as the Web Audio and Web MIDI APIs, and runs in a web browser.
The plan is for the app to remain free to use and ad-free for the foreseeable future.
